title: Lauren Bell and New York Tales
description: England bowler Lauren Bell and our Jimmy ‘nerd out’ on remodelled actions, out swingers, biomechanics and training regimes. Plus baseball, bad food, awards, dead ducks and almost a quiz from Mattchin.
author: BBC Radio 5 Live
excerpt: England bowler Lauren Bell and our Jimmy ‘nerd out’.
